item.title: Beyond the Blog: Exploiting WordPress CVEs on HTB 'MetaTwo'
item.description: Write-up for ‘MetaTwo’, a box that involves exploiting WordPress CVEs with multiple vectors (SQLi, XXE, LFI) for foothold, and then leveraging passpie for root privilege escalation.

item.description: Medium rated Windows box from hackthebox that involves building a malicious .NET solution project for foothold, and exploiting ‘FullPowers’ via SeImpersonate for privilege escalation.

item.description: Walkthrough of a medium-rated Windows AD box involving LDAP manipulation, cracking an Ansible vault, and escalating to Domain Admin via the AD CS ESC1 exploit.
